HOME_OUR_PROFILE_FIRST_CONTENT: Established in September 2020, the Company brings expertise, experiences, networks and strong financial capability in the industry.
HOME_OUR_PROFILE_SECOND_CONTENT: The Company has its core business activities in commercializing web-portal and digital platform. It is also optimized with our ability to deliver an integrated solution to accommodate the customers needs.
HOME_OUR_PROFILE_THIRD_CONTENT: With a combined strong technical – commercial – operations abilities, the Company is able to deliver the best output for customers’ satisfaction.
ABOUT_MERDEKA_FIRST_CONTENT: Merdeka Pulsa is a trustworthy provider of digital products who is also supported with latest technology to guarantee the security of your transaction.
ABOUT_MERDEKA_SECOND_CONTENT: Merdeka Pulsa commits to encourage convenience in  accelerating clients' business by offering simple registration, smooth transactions, web-access for transactions monitoring, competitive product prices, and responsive helpdesk.
